40001017.English_Text:
(Oh, now my body
feels so much lighter!)

40001019.Chinese_Text:
各位选手~！
准备好了吗啊啊~！

40001020.English_Text:
(The Finals will start soon.
Let's go to the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>arena</>!)
40001020.Chinese_Text:
（决赛要开始了。
去竞技场吧！）

40001021.English_Text:
(Once I leave these doors,
I'll be facing off with <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Aran</>!)
40001021.Chinese_Text:
（走出这道门就要
进行与饿狼的决赛！）

40001022.English_Text:
(Let's try our best
and put on a great show!)
40001022.Chinese_Text:
（彼此竭尽全力
打出异常精彩的比赛吧！）

40001023.English_Text: They're not wary of me now!

40001024.English_Text:
I should go and talk
to their <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>boss</>.
40001024.Chinese_Text:
先跟他们的队长
对话吧。

40001025.English_Text:
(I need to take responsibility
for ruining the tournament.)
40001025.Chinese_Text:
（需要负起
毁掉大会的责任。）

40001026.English_Text:
I'll follow the road out
and search for the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>encampment</>!
40001026.Chinese_Text:
先走出这里
寻找营帐吧！

40001028.English_Text:
(I'll follow Aran
out of the arena.)
40001028.Chinese_Text:
（跟随饿狼
离开竞技场吧。）

40001029.English_Text:
Wait fur a moment, meow!
Over here!
40001029.Chinese_Text:
等一下喵！
是这里喵！

40001030.English_Text:
(Soul Bridge Member Baron Dondon
gave me a <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Soul Scroll</>.)
40001030.Chinese_Text:
（灵交院巴隆东东
给了灵魂召唤书。）

40001031.English_Text:
(This is amazing!
I'll use it right away!)
40001031.Chinese_Text:
（真让人期待。
快点使用吧！）

40001033.English_Text:
You can use the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Soul</>
you just obtained, meow!
40001033.Chinese_Text:
你可以马上使用
刚刚获得的灵魂喵~！

40001035.English_Text:
(I'll follow Aran out
and head towards the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Edeta's encampment</>.)
40001035.Chinese_Text:
（跟着饿狼
去艾瑞达营帐吧。）

40001037.Chinese_Text:
（霞凛提到的队员
在那里。）

40001038.English_Text:
(I should ask <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Doha</>
what I need to do.)
40001038.Chinese_Text:
（问那个叫桃荷的人
应该做什么吧。）

40001041.English_Text:
(Here's a Baron dressed similarly
to Dondon.)
40001041.Chinese_Text:
（这个广场
也太狭小了吧？）

40001042.English_Text:
(Let's ask if this place
is the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>square</>.)
40001042.Chinese_Text:
（问一下这里
是不是广场吧。）

40001043.Chinese_Text:
（很好奇守护灵
到底是什么！）

40001044.English_Text:
(Let's use the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Summon Scroll</>
I received from Dundun!)
40001044.Chinese_Text:
（用一下咚咚
给的召唤书吧！）

40001045.English_Text:
(It feels as if I've gained
something invaluable!)
40001045.Chinese_Text:
（好像获得了
很惊人的东西！）

40001047.English_Text:
(I'll head to the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>square</>
and meet up with the Saho and Aran.)
40001047.Chinese_Text:
（快去广场与
饿狼及四虎见面吧。）

40001049.English_Text:
(The people next to Aran
must be the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Saho</>.)
40001049.Chinese_Text:
（饿狼身边的人们
应该就是四虎。）

40001051.English_Text:
(Let's take care of the request and
obtain a <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Plaque of Merit</>!)

40001052.English_Text:
(I need to complete their request and
claim the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Plaque of Merit</>.)
40001052.Chinese_Text:
（需要解决四虎的委托
并搜集赏功牌。）

40001059.English_Text:
(That must be one of
the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Soul Bridge Herbalists</>.)
40001059.Chinese_Text:
（应该是灵交院
采药员之一。）

40001060.English_Text:
(People with blue skin...
must be the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Blueskin</>.)
40001060.Chinese_Text:
青色皮肤的人吗，
应该是青人族。

40001061.English_Text:
Let's head to the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>wreckage</>
and save the Barons.
40001061.Chinese_Text:
快去遇难船
救出巴隆吧。

40001062.English_Text:
Ah! <textColor=[255:204:102:255]><myHero.name/></>!
There's a strange scroll
on the ground!
40001062.Chinese_Text:
啊！<textColor=[255:204:102:255]><myHero.name/></>！
有个可疑的卷轴掉在地上！

40001063.English_Text:
I think the situation
took a turn for the worse!

40001065.English_Text:
Ah!
You guys were safe all along!
40001065.Chinese_Text: 呜呜~！！大家都平安无事喵！！

40001066.English_Text:
(Ah, he followed me because
he was worried about <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Ling Ling</>.)
40001066.Chinese_Text:
（啊，看来他很担心铃铃，
所以才会跟过来。）

40001067.English_Text:
I should get the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Halfmoon Herb</> near
the wreckage.
40001067.Chinese_Text:
把遇难船附近的
半月草带回来吧。

40001068.Chinese_Text:
幸好海盗夏草
现在不在。

40001071.Chinese_Text:
把情况告诉
噗隆噗隆吧。

40001072.English_Text:
I've obtained the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Plaque of Merit</>
from the Soul Bridge!
40001072.Chinese_Text:
获得了灵交院的
赏功牌！

40001075.Chinese_Text:
（那个人应该就是
大鱼坊总舵主。）

40001076.Chinese_Text:
（看来也未获得
多少信任。）

40001078.English_Text:
Stealing only <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>food</>
and leaving all the valuables?
40001078.Chinese_Text:
丢下贵重品不管，
只偷粮食？

40001079.Original_Text: 보통 도둑은 아닐 것 \n같은데? 일단 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>목공의</> \n<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>거처</>로 가보자!
40001079.English_Text:
That doesn't sound like
your everyday thief. Let's head towards
the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]><textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Carpenter's Quarters</></>!
40001079.Chinese_Text:
看来不是普通的小偷？
先去木匠房屋看看吧！

40001080.Chinese_Text: 跟随脚印追上去看看吧。

40001082.English_Text:
(I'd better make the Ratman pay for
stealing other people's things.)
40001082.Chinese_Text:
（让他们付出
偷东西的代价。）

40001083.Chinese_Text:
里面好像有
鼠人族的基地。

40001084.Chinese_Text:
果然有
更多鼠人族。

40001085.English_Text:
I don't trust them one bit,
so I'll just take care of them!
40001085.Chinese_Text:
不知道他们会搞什么鬼，
还是全都消灭掉吧！

40001088.English_Text:
I should head west towards
the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Lakeside House</>.
40001088.Chinese_Text:
去西边的
湖边别墅吧。

40001091.English_Text:
The blood trails lead
<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>behind the house</>.
40001091.Chinese_Text:
血痕一直连到了
房屋后面。

40001092.Chinese_Text: （那个看起来危险的东西是什么？！）

40001093.English_Text: (I'd better get rid of it now and think later!)

40001096.English_Text:
I've obtained the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Plaque of Merit</>
from the Plum Blossom!
40001096.Chinese_Text:
获得了梅花团的
赏功牌！

40001099.Chinese_Text:
那个人好像
就是郭柳玉。

40001100.Chinese_Text:
问问发生了
什么事吧。

40001101.Chinese_Text:
看来马车
遭到了袭击。

40001102.Chinese_Text:
帮忙找回
被偷走的货物吧。

40001103.English_Text:
I think I have everything!
Let's head back.

40001104.Chinese_Text:
这个山丘上面
就是自卫团岗哨。

40001105.Chinese_Text:
去了解一下
发生了什么事吧。

40001106.Chinese_Text:
那个人应该就是
自卫团岗哨长。

40001107.English_Text:
(Ah! He's running away
all of a sudden.)

40001108.English_Text:
Something is fishy.
Let's go after him.

40001109.English_Text:
The Guards are <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>attacking</>
all of a sudden!
Be careful!
40001109.Chinese_Text:
自卫团突然发动了攻击！
小心点！

40001110.English_Text:
(Whew...
We were able to subdue him.)

40001111.English_Text: I should question the Outpost Captain.

40001112.English_Text:
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Orders from above</>...
I wonder who they are?
40001112.Chinese_Text:
上头的指示吗...
到底是谁？

40001113.English_Text:
I should bring this <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>order</>
back with me.
40001113.Chinese_Text:
先带着这个命令书
回去吧。

40001114.English_Text:
I've obtained the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Plaque of Merit</>
from the Peach Blossom!
40001114.Chinese_Text:
获得了桃花商廛的
赏功牌！

40001118.English_Text:
Let's find <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Steel Fist</>.
He should be nearby.
40001118.Chinese_Text:
去寻找在这附近的
铁拳吧。

40001119.Chinese_Text:
那个人应该
就是铁拳。

40001120.English_Text:
Steel Fist seems...
to be wrapped up in an unrequited love?
40001120.Chinese_Text:
看起来这个人...
好像在单相思？

40001121.Original_Text: 뭐, 알아서 하게 두고,\n<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>화물 보관소</>나 다녀오자!
40001121.English_Text:
To each their own.
I'll check on the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Cargo House</>!
40001121.Chinese_Text:
唔，让他自己解决吧。
我要去一趟货物保管所！

40001122.Chinese_Text: 看来这里就是货物保管所。

40001123.English_Text:
Let's ask the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>employee</> over there
and find out what's going on.
40001123.Chinese_Text:
跟那个员工
问事情的原委吧。

40001124.Chinese_Text:
哇...
这个人真没礼貌。

40001125.English_Text: I'll just secretly infiltrate the facility.

40001126.English_Text:
Ah, the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>employees</> are
talking about something.
40001126.Chinese_Text:
啊，员工们在
说什么事情。

40001127.English_Text:
I'll creep up behind them
and listen in.
40001127.Chinese_Text:
到后面
偷听一下吧。

40001129.English_Text:
Let's go to the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>location</>
the employees were talking about!
40001129.Chinese_Text:
去员工们
提到的场所吧！

40001130.English_Text:
I should take care of those
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>mercenaries</> first.
40001130.Chinese_Text:
看来需要先
解决那些佣兵。

40001132.English_Text:
There's a <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>letter</>?
What did it say?
40001132.Chinese_Text:
真的有书信？
写着什么内容？

40001134.English_Text:
You're not exactly honest,
are you? Haha.
40001134.Chinese_Text:
真是个不坦率的人，
哈哈。

40001135.English_Text:
I've obtained the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Plaque of Merit</>
from the Soul Steel!
40001135.Chinese_Text:
获得了金庚哲门的
赏功牌！

40001137.English_Text:
(Ah! A <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>strange rat</>
is beckoning me forward.)
40001137.Chinese_Text:
（诶？有个可疑的老鼠
在打招呼。）

40001138.English_Text: They did say they don't mind how I got it.
40001138.Chinese_Text: 用什么办法都无所谓吧？

40001139.English_Text:
If I've got the coins,
buying these could be an <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>option</>!
40001139.Chinese_Text:
只要有足够的钱，
买也是一个办法！

40001140.English_Text:
They are so expensive,
but that saved me some time!
40001140.Chinese_Text:
太贵了。
不过至少节省了时间！

40001146.English_Text:
(All right, let's go meet up
with <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Harum</>.)

40001147.English_Text:
(I'll tell Harum I've collected
all the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Plaque of Merit</>!)
40001147.Chinese_Text:
（告诉霞凛
搜集了所有赏功牌吧！）

40001148.English_Text:
(What's going on?
I should follow them.)
40001148.Chinese_Text:
（发生了什么事？
跟上去看看吧。）

40001150.English_Text:
(Let's talk with <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Aran</>
about what we'll do.)
40001150.Chinese_Text:
（先跟饿狼
商量一下以后的事吧。）

40001151.English_Text:
(Aran is going to look
for the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Caelite</>.)

40001152.English_Text:
(What <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>request</> is Orum going to
ask me to do?)
40001152.Chinese_Text:
（旿凜会
委托我做什么事呢？）

40001153.English_Text:
(There's a <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>merchant</> that
deals in Plaques of Merit.)
40001153.Chinese_Text:
（听说有个商人
会给交换赏功牌。）

40001159.English_Text:
(I feel as though
I might be sucked in.)

40001163.Chinese_Text:
（感觉到全身
充满新的力量。）

40001164.English_Text:
(I feel like I could use
a new <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Windwalk</>.)
40001164.Chinese_Text:
（感觉可以使用
新的轻功了。）

40001167.Chinese_Text:
（确认一下
有没有顺利获得吧~！）

40001169.Chinese_Text:
（找找饿狼
说过的营地吧。）

40001170.English_Text:
(This must be the place
that Aran mentioned!)
40001170.Chinese_Text:
（这里就是饿狼
说的场所！）

40001171.English_Text:
(The cute little Barons are setting up
their <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>campsite</>!)
40001171.Chinese_Text:
（可爱的巴隆们
建立了营地！）

40001174.English_Text:
(Where did they come from?
I was really surprised.)
40001174.Chinese_Text:
（不知道从哪里出现的，
吓了一大跳。）

40001175.English_Text:
(I'll check if this shiny object
is indeed <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Caelite</>.)
40001175.Chinese_Text:
（查看一下
闪耀的东西是不是閟玉。）

40001176.English_Text:
(I should ask if
other <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Caelites</>
are useless.)
40001176.Chinese_Text:
（问其他閟玉
是不是没用。）

40001177.English_Text:
Haha, not really.
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Caelite</> is generally
very expensive.
40001177.Chinese_Text:
哈哈，并非如此。
其他閟玉非常昂贵。

40001178.English_Text:
That's why a lot of
people hunt for them
in the first place.
40001178.Chinese_Text:
这也是很多普通人
拼命寻找閟玉的理由。

40001179.Original_Text: 그리고 이미 너도 \n알고 있겠지만\n<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>수라</> 같은 경우에는
40001179.English_Text:
And you might already
know this, but in the case of
the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Sura</>,
40001179.Chinese_Text:
你也已经知道，
修罗需要

40001180.English_Text:
they absorb the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>power</>
of the Caelite, thereby
extending their power and life.
40001180.Chinese_Text:
吸收閟玉的气息
以延长自己的力量与生命。

40001181.Original_Text: 하지만 그들은 \n비옥 자체를 \n<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>직접 흡수</>할 순 없어서,
40001181.English_Text:
However, they are
unable to absorb
the<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Caelite itself</>.
40001181.Chinese_Text:
但他们无法直接
吸收閟玉本身，

40001182.Original_Text: 누군가 비옥에 이끌려 와서\n<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>봉인</>을 해제하는 걸 \n노리곤 하지.
40001182.English_Text:
That's why they usually try to wait for
someone to <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>unseal</> it
and then ambush them.
40001182.Chinese_Text:
所以他们寄希望于其他人被閟玉
吸引过来之后解除封印。

40001183.English_Text:
I want to
hear some more.

40001184.English_Text:
My story must have been
very amusing! Haha.
40001184.Chinese_Text:
我的故事很有趣吧？
哈哈。

40001185.English_Text:
But for now, let's finish
investigating this area first.
40001185.Chinese_Text:
不过，现在需要
先完成调查。

40001186.Chinese_Text:
（这里就是饿狼提到的
陡峭悬崖~！）

40001187.English_Text:
(I'll take a look
at the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>top of the cliff</>!)
40001187.Chinese_Text:
（在悬崖上面
寻找一下吧！）

40001188.Chinese_Text:
（啊！那里有个
闪耀的东西！）

40001190.Chinese_Text:
（难道想把手中的东西
交给我？）

40001192.English_Text:
(I never knew that
I could absorb Caelite.)
40001192.Chinese_Text:
（没想到我也
能吸收閟玉。）

40001193.Chinese_Text:
（如果吸收更多䛝怡的閟玉，
应该能找回更多记忆。）

40001197.English_Text:
(I should ask that person
about the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Hollow</>!)
40001197.Chinese_Text:
（跟那个人问
有关不磨者的事情吧！）

40001198.Chinese_Text:
（虽然概率很低，
要不要狩猎不磨者呢？）

40001200.English_Text:
(It seems I can <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>donate money</>
and purchase it.)
40001200.Chinese_Text:
（如果有钱的话，
捐赠应该最简单。）

40001202.Chinese_Text:
（获得不磨者之核的办法
有很多。）

40001203.English_Text:
(It seems the core will come
if I hunt a <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Hollow</>.)
40001203.Chinese_Text:
（虽然概率很低，
要不要狩猎不磨者呢？）

40001205.English_Text:
(It seems I can <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>donate money</>
and purchase it.)
40001205.Chinese_Text:
（如果有钱的话，
捐赠应该最简单。）

40001206.Chinese_Text:
（顺利完成了
霞凛的任务~）

40001207.English_Text:
(I can see <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Harum</>.
I should relay the fruits of my labor.)
40001207.Chinese_Text:
（看到了霞凛。
去告诉结果吧。）

40001209.English_Text:
(I'll head to the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Deep Forest Graveyard</>
that Harum mentioned.)
40001209.Chinese_Text:
（去霞凛告诉我的
幽深墓地森林吧。）

40001210.English_Text:
(I should deal with these entities
that disrupt the forest.)
40001210.Chinese_Text:
（清理扰乱森林的
那些家伙吧。）

40001211.Chinese_Text:
（怪物已经被
清理得差不多了。）

40001216.English_Text:
(A mysterious device has appeared
on <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>both sides of the room</>!)
40001216.Chinese_Text:
（<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>房间两侧</>出现了
神奇的装置！）

40001217.Chinese_Text: （看来那个人就是艾瑞达的桃荷。）

40001218.English_Text:
(Ah, there stands Edeta member Doha,
whom I met at the Pub.)
40001218.Chinese_Text:
（啊！在总舵见过面的
艾瑞达队员桃荷站在那里。）

40001220.English_Text:
Excuse me, <textColor=[255:204:102:255]><myHero.name/></>.
There's something else I have to tell you.

40001222.Original_Text: (드디어 홍린의 핵을 구했다!\n축지를 사용해 수월항으로 돌아가자!)
40001222.English_Text:
(Finally, I've got Hongrin's Core!
I should go back to Moonwater Harbor through Windstride.)
40001222.Chinese_Text:
（终于获得了红林之核！
使用遁地回到水月港吧！）

40001223.English_Text:
Hey, wait!
I want to talk to you!
40001223.Chinese_Text:
喂！请等一下！
我有话要说！

40001224.Original_Text: (결승 진출자를 위한\n반달호수 주민들의\n응원 선물이 있다고 한다~!)
40001224.English_Text:
(The Sapphire Basin residents
have prepared a gift to cheer up
the finalists!)
40001224.Chinese_Text:
（半月湖居民们为
决赛选手们
准备了加油礼物～！）

40001225.Original_Text: (드러난 유적지로\n축지를 사용하면\n더 빨리 갈 수 있겠다~!)
40001225.English_Text:
(We'll get there faster
if we windstride
to the Barren Ruins!)
40001225.Chinese_Text:
（使用遁地就能
更快抵达
显露的遗址~！）

40001226.English_Text:
The medicine will lose effect, you idiot!
Go straight to the arena!
40001226.Chinese_Text:
笨蛋，药效会消失！
快去竞技场！！！

40001228.Original_Text: 소협! 늦어서 죄송합니다!\n이게 다 어찌된 일인가요?
40001228.English_Text:
I'm sorry for being late!
What's all this?
40001228.Chinese_Text:
少侠！抱歉，我来晚了！
这是怎么回事？

40001229.Chinese_Text:
上吧，我的士兵们！！
哇哈哈哈！！

40001230.Original_Text: 뭣들 하는 거야!?\n당장 저 놈을 죽이란 말야!!
40001230.English_Text:
What are you all waiting for!?
Kill him!
40001230.Chinese_Text:
你们在干什么？！
快点干掉那家伙！！

40001231.English_Text:
Ugh... My body...
Something's horribly wrong!
40001231.Chinese_Text:
唔呃...我...我的...
身体有些奇怪？！

40001232.English_Text:
(What in the world
is <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Makara</> up to?)
40001232.Chinese_Text:
（天啊，<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>林延秀</>到底
做出了什么事？！！）

40001233.Original_Text: 야! 거기 너 임마!\n당장 이리로 튀어와!
40001233.English_Text:
You! You there!
Come here immediately!
40001233.Chinese_Text:
喂！你这家伙！
快点过来！

40001234.Chinese_Text:
(即使是精英西方人
也让我们振作起来!)

40001235.English_Text:
(Fish thieves also
I think they stole the cargo)

40001236.English_Text:
(Let's retrieve the cargo that the crab thieves
taken
 too!)
40001236.Chinese_Text:
(我们把蟹贼带来的货物
带回来吧!)
